titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: MARGIN INVOLVED INDICATION CODE (COLORECTAL PROXIMAL OR DISTAL RESECTION MARGIN) - Description

body.p: MARGIN INVOLVED INDICATION CODE (COLORECTAL PROXIMAL OR DISTAL RESECTION MARGIN) is the same as attribute MARGIN INVOLVED INDICATION CODE FOR COLORECTAL to record whether the proximal or distal resection margins were involved during a Colorectal Cancer Care Spell .
Note: if the minimum distance from the cut margin is less than or equal to 1 mm the margin is considered "involved".
